key_changes: Added TARGET_QUERIES constant with 5 TCG-related search queries
Added comprehensive documentation comments explaining the purpose of target queries
Queries are configured for weekly AI assistant monitoring (ChatGPT, Claude, Perplexity)
Queries focus on trading card game storage, organization, and protection topics
file_insights.data_structure: List of strings containing search queries for AEO (Answer Engine Optimization) monitoring

patterns_discovered.description: Constants are organized by functional domain (CHANNELS followed by TARGET_QUERIES)
Configuration additions include detailed comments explaining purpose, usage frequency, and target platforms
Queries are designed to be tested across multiple AI assistants for comprehensive AEO tracking
Queries are tailored to TCG (Trading Card Game) market segment with focus on storage and organization pain points

gotchas_discovered.description: Weekly monitoring across ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity requires ensuring query format compatibility and response parsing logic across different AI models
TCG queries may have seasonal variations in search intent and competitive landscape that should be monitored
Monitoring brand citations across different AI assistants requires consistent metrics and attribution tracking mechanisms

approach_outcome.summary: Successfully added target query configuration to config.py for AEO monitoring
approach_outcome.implementation_quality: High - well-documented, organized, and contextually appropriate queries selected
approach_outcome.integration_readiness: Configuration is ready for integration with monitoring scripts but assumes downstream implementation exists for query testing and citation tracking

recommendations.rationale: The configuration is in place but needs corresponding implementation to actually test these queries against AI assistants and track citations
Establish clear success metrics for brand mentions, citation frequency, and ranking position across different AI assistants
Consider adding seasonal variations of these queries (e.g., holiday season, back-to-school) to capture variations in search intent
While queries are relevant, documenting why these specific queries were chosen would help with future maintenance and additions
As queries are rolled out, validate that they represent actual high-volume searches in the TCG market segment
